:mod:`source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_45kW`
=====================================

.. py:module:: source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_45kW

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This script configures sensorless vector control for an induction motor.
   The default values correspond to a 45-kW induction motor.

   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_45kW.BaseValues
   source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_45kW.CtrlParameters



.. py:class:: BaseValues

   This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values.
   These are used for plotting the results.
















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. attribute:: w
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: i
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: u
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: p
      :annotation: :int = 2

      

   .. attribute:: psi
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: P
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: Z
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: L
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: tau
      :annotation: :float

      


.. py:class:: CtrlParameters

   This data class contains parameters for the control system.
















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. attribute:: sensorless
      :annotation: :bool = True

      

   .. attribute:: T_s
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: alpha_c
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: alpha_o
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: alpha_s
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: tau_M_max
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: i_s_max
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: psi_R_nom
      :annotation: :float = 0.95

      

   .. attribute:: u_dc_nom
      :annotation: :float = 540

      

   .. attribute:: R_s
      :annotation: :float = 0.057

      

   .. attribute:: R_R
      :annotation: :float = 0.029

      

   .. attribute:: L_sgm
      :annotation: :float = 0.0022

      

   .. attribute:: L_M
      :annotation: :float = 0.0245

      

   .. attribute:: p
      :annotation: :int = 2

      

   .. attribute:: J
      :annotation: :float
